titleStmt.title: VII. articles drawen up against Lord Kimelton. M. Iohn Pimme. M. Densil Hollis. S. Artgur [sic] Haslerick. M. Hamden. M. Stroud. Charging them of high treason vvith his Maiestie his speech in the House of Commons Janu. 4, 1641. And a petition to the Kings Majesty.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
